title: Office Aide (FWS Eligible) Student Worker I
duties_responsibilities: Assist with general office support including: light typing, filing, scanning, and copying.
Professional communication with students, staff, faculty, and general public in person and by telephone.
Data entry and word processing using MS Office software.
Various other duties as assigned by immediate supervisor to assist College of Law in everyday operations.
required_qualifications: Little or no training or experience is required.
preferred_qualifications: Excellent English verbal and written proficiency and communication skills; working knowledge of MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and the ability to work independently.
Attention to detail, accuracy, good judgement, professionalism, and organizational skills a must.
Experience with PC & typing; knowledge of telephone etiquette.
